Package org.apache.lucene.index

Class MappedMultiFields

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.index.Fields
      • org.apache.lucene.index.FilterLeafReader.FilterFields
        • org.apache.lucene.index.MappedMultiFields
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<String>
    public class MappedMultiFields
extends FilterLeafReader.FilterFields
    A Fields implementation that merges multiple Fields into one, and maps around deleted documents. This is used for merging.
    NOTE: This API is for internal purposes only and might change in incompatible ways in the next release.
